column4: I burned Ubuntu to a dvd. When I try to apt-get build-essential it asks me for to insert the cd even though the dvd is already in. What can I do?
if you have a cnnection to the internet to download from there, as root edit /etc/apt/sources.lst and comment out (using #) the lines that refer to the CD
I don't. That's why I'm not.
sorry, can't help you- don't know enough about using the cd :(
